document.title: Songbook 3.6.1
document.content:
Hi there

A new songbook release is now available. This version 3.6.1 brings a lot of visual tweaks.

  • Reduced line spacing: cool, 100 pages saved! In my opinion, it improves readability by emphasizing blocks for verses. Besides, more songs fit in a single page so they are easier to read :)
  • Display album titles under artist name
  • New options 'original' and 'url' to indicate the original song and a link to the artist website. For instance, see JCFrog
    • songs.
  • Revamped bridge environment with a dotted vertical bar.
  • New macro \Adlib
  • New macro \transposition{n} that indicates a shift or apply a chord transposition if mode repeatedchords is on (for instance, see Barbara - L'aigle noir)
  • Remove the section title 'List of songs' that was quite useless.
  • Rewrite the list of guitar/ukulele diagrams at the beginning of the document with better aligned boxes and improved layout. Thanks to Kaosun for his list of ukulele chords!
